item.title: The Dynamics GP window is either not visible or has been hidden.
item.description: I recently encountered a strange issue with GP 10 on a remote Terminal Server. After minimizing the main GP 10 window and disconnecting, I couldn’t resize or maximize the window upon reconnecting. It remained stuck in the taskbar. Closing and reopening GP 10 didn’t resolve the problem, nor did logging out and back in. I remembered that a configuration file stores window location data, but I hadn’t encountered this specific problem in years.
